content:
Hi everyone, new-ish contributor here

I was wondering if anyone could initiate a stabilization PR. There's a feature I'd like to get stabilized and it's passed the final commenting period. If it's possible I feel like making a stabilization PR would be a decent small step to get acquainted with the procedures.

Cheers!
As long as no one has claimed the issue saying they're going to make a PR, it should be fine.
Nonâ€“team members open stabilization PRs all the time.
Cool! I'll make one then! Thanks for the help!
@Patrick Poitras What's the feature?
